Redesign a Flight Booking Mobile App

UX/UI designer who has a great enthusiasm for designing digital products that make life easier and happier
Role

User researching

Wireframing

UI designing

Timeline

Approx. 1 Week

Platform

Mobile

Tools

Figma, Notion

Overview

Vietjet Air (VJ) is a low cost carrier airline flying to domestic & international routes in Vietnam. They have been receiving many bad feedbacks from users. One of the reasons is their poorly-designed interface. It is not only unhelpful to customers, it also shows the unprofessionalization of their development team. So, I took the liberty of using some of my design skills to try to re-design a flow of booking and payment.

Problem
